summary: Ethereum (ETH) is a programmable blockchain for apps and digital agreements. ETH pays for gas and secures consensus via Proof-of-Stake.
highlights: Programmable EVM with ERC standards and composability
EIP-1559 base fee burn linking usage to supply pressure
Rollup-centric scaling: L2s inherit L1 security

seo.title: Ethereum (ETH) Explained — Programmable Blockchain & Staking
seo.description: ETH in plain terms with cross-links to real exchange pairs and absolute URLs for crawlers.
